sentences.sContent: The product suddenly took off in September.
sentences.sContent_eng: The product suddenly took off in September.
sentences.sCn: 该产品在九月份突然热销起来。

sentences.sContent: Do I remember that September afternoon when I first met you?
sentences.sContent_eng: Do I remember that September afternoon when I first met you?
sentences.sCn: 还记不记得第一次遇见你的那个九月的下午？

sentences.sContent: The carmaker is almost ready to launch out a new model in September.
sentences.sContent_eng: The carmaker is almost ready to launch out a new model in September.
sentences.sCn: 汽车制造商将于九月投产新型汽车。

trans.tranOther: the ninth month of the year, between August and October
